name: OptimizelyX
description: Deploy code behind feature flags or experiment with A/B tests
author: Microsoft Corporation
releaseNotes: Manage Optimizely experiements and feature rollouts.

inputs.name: OptimizelyXEndpoint
inputs.label: Optimizely Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Optimizely service endpoint to be used to be used to manage A/B test.

inputs.name: Project
inputs.label: Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the name of the project.

inputs.name: Environment
inputs.label: Environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Environment of the project. By default environment will be production.

inputs.name: Type
inputs.label: Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the experiment or Features as type.

inputs.name: Feature
inputs.label: Feature
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the name of the feature

inputs.name: Action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the action to be performed.

inputs.name: Experiment
inputs.label: Experiment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the name of the experiment.

inputs.name: Traffic
inputs.label: Traffic
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify what percentage of total traffic you would like to A/B test.

inputs.name: TrafficByVariation
inputs.label: Experiment variations
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify variations for the experiment and their corresponding traffic percentages.

inputs.name: FeatureVariables
inputs.label: Feature variables
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Defined variables will be added to existing variable set and if variable with same name exists it will be overridden.
[
{"value": "true",
"type": "boolean",
"name": "dEF"
},
{"name": "name",
"type": "string",
"value": "test1"
}]

inputs.name: Audience
inputs.label: Audience
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the Target Audience for this Experiment or feature flag.
